2. Using algo_deduplicate - Entry points¶

2.1. Dependencies¶

  • python (3.6)
  • tensorflow (1.12)
  • keras (2.2.4)

2.2. Run¶

1. Go to the project directory: PRJ_PATH=/path/to/items_deduplication/ cd PRJ_PATH

  1. run algo_deduplicate using the command:

bash>> python run_deduplication.py path/2/image_1 path/2/image_2

This piece of code get image_1 & image_2 as inputs and return a score between 0 and 100 indicating whether they are duplicates (close to 100) or not (close to 0)

2.3. Testing¶

Run unittests

bash>> iduplicate_tests.py

  • Feel free to add more unittest cases for more checking

deduplication
